arts.ttl: 'I chose Arsenal offer over Barcelona – but my time there didn't match my expectations'
arts.sum: Few people would snub Barcelona for any club in world football, but one former Arsenal star rejected the Spanish giants to become a Gunner instead

arts.ttl: Barca’s Shark finally bites as Flick gets subs spot on in Dortmund
arts.sum: From his predatory instincts for his first goal to his arrowed finish for the second to win the game, it was goalscoring and forward play of the highest quality. A win against a Dortmund side who don’t make it easy for any opposition sides at Signal Iduna Park isn’t to be sniffed at, and indeed, it was their first home defeat in the Champions League since November 2021.

arts.ttl: ‘These are the games that bring you together’ - Ferran hails Barca win
arts.sum: Ferran was delighted after the match and said it’s the kind of win that will bring the team together. Ferran Torres was the match-winner for Barcelona against Dortmund on Wednesday, coming off the bench to score twice in a 3-2 win.

arts.ttl: BVB's Schlotterbeck exits with severe ankle injury
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund defender Nico Schlotterbeck was carried off on a stretcher with what seemed to be a severe ankle injury near the end of his team's loss to Barcelona in the Champions League on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Raphinha injury latest: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick plays down fears after Borussia Dortmund Champions League victory
arts.sum: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick has said that Raphinha did not pick up an injury against Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League on Wednesday night, and insisted that the forward was just tired.

arts.ttl: Thierry Henry makes his allegiances clear with Arsenal and Barcelona response
arts.sum: Two of Thierry Henry's former clubs, Arsenal and Monaco, played each other in the Champions League, while another of his ex-employers, Barcelona, came up against Borussia Dortmund

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick hails ‘wonderful’ Barcelona after Dortmund win
arts.sum: Barcelona manager Hansi Flick was a happy man after seeing his team beat Dortmund 3-2 in the Champions League on Wednesday. Goals from Raphinha and a brace from substitute Ferran Torres secured a good win for the Catalans, leaving Flick to praise his side.

arts.ttl: Post-Match Reaction: Borussia Dortmund Fall to Barcelona in Back-and-Forth Affair
arts.sum: The young tactician unleashed a starting XI that featured Giovanni Reyna and Julien Duranville - two players who have played less than 200 minutes this season. Dortmund responded quickly with a penalty from Serhou Guirassy, but the back-and-forth continued as Ferran Torres notched a second for the away side 13 minutes later.

arts.ttl: ‘I just give him the ball’ – Marc Casadó hails ‘world-class’ Barcelona teammate after win over Dortmund
arts.sum: Barcelona star Marc Casadó has tonight moved to lavish praise on a fellow member of the club’s midfield ranks. The player in question? Pedri. Casadó and Pedri were both in…

arts.ttl: Match-winner Ferran Torres was beaten to Man of the Match prize by Barcelona teammate vs Dortmund
arts.sum: Barcelona star Ferran Torres was not recognised for his efforts in the club’s meeting with Borussia Dortmund with the Man of the Match award. Frontman Ferran, for his part, is…
